articles.title: Pro14: League plans for 22 August return with games between teams from same nation - BBC South East Wales
articles.description: The Pro14 is aiming to resume on 22 August with teams from the same nation playing against each other in a series of behind closed doors games.
articles.content:
Leinster are the reigning Pro14 champions
